Starter Deck Card Lists
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Farm and Monster Rancher Cards: Monster Rancher CCG (Artbox, 2000): Card Lists: Starter Deck Card Lists
By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, February 13, 2008 - 01:12 pm:

The cards in each of the starter decks are always the same, there is no random distribution of cards here!

Two Player Starter Deck: Contains a Baddies and a Goodies Deck
30 cards each, total 60 cards
